Text: The first time I watched this movie I had to rent it, but now I won't have to do that anymore. Thanks. Will seed for sure.

WARNING: This is the EXTENDED EDITION. Not the "Director's Cut", as the director has said that he prefers the original version. They added some scenes, including some *after* the ending of the original, which, IMO, diminishes the emotional impact of the ending. No doubt, this is still an excellent movie, but I recommend watching the original version first if you haven't seen it yet.

See here for details: http://movie-censorship.com/report.php?ID=1083
